title: Sister Winter
lyrics:
Oh my friends I've
Begun to worry right
Where I should be grateful
I should be satisfied
Oh my heart I

Would clap and dance in place

With my friends I have so

Much pleasure to embrace



But my heart is

Returned to sister winter

But my heart is

As cold as ice



Oh my thoughts I

Return to summer time

When I kissed your ankle

I kissed you through the night



All my gifts I gave everything to you

Your strange imagination

You threw it all away



Now my heart is

Returned to sister winter

Now my heart is

As cold as ice



All my friends, I've

Returned to sister winter

All my friends, I

Apologise, apologise



All my friends, I've

Returned to sister winter

All my friends, I

Apologise, apologise



All my friends, I've

Returned to sister winter

All my friends, I

Apologise, apologise



La la la la la...



And my friends, I've

Returned to wish you all the best

And my friends, I've

Returned to wish you all the best

And my friends, I've

Returned to wish you all the best

And my friends, I've

Returned to wish you a Happy Christmas



To wish you a Happy Christmas

To wish you a Happy Christmas

To wish you a Happy Christmas
